Title: The Hunt
Overview: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son’s custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
production_companies: Zentropa Entertainments, Det Danske Filminstitut, Danmarks Radio (DR), Eurimages, MEDIA Programme of the European Union, Sveriges Television (SVT), Svenska Filminstitutet (SFI), Nordisk Film- & TV-Fond, Film Väst
Cast: Mads Mikkelsen, Alexandra Rapaport, Thomas Bo Larsen
